user.title: S3 Storage Configuration
user.description: Configure your S3 compatible storage for backups. This works with any S3 compatible storage provider (AWS S3, MinIO, Wasabi, Backblaze B2, etc.).

data_description.access_key_id: The access key ID for your S3 compatible storage.
data_description.secret_access_key: The secret access key for your S3 compatible storage.
data_description.bucket: The bucket name where backups will be stored. The bucket must already exist and be writable.
data_description.endpoint_url: The endpoint URL of your S3 compatible storage (e.g., https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com or https://your-minio-server:9000).
data_description.region: The region of your S3 compatible storage (e.g., us-east-1, eu-central-1).
data_description.prefix: The root folder for backups in the bucket. Backups will be stored in {prefix}/backups/. Default: homeassistant

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate S3 Storage
reauth_confirm.description: The credentials for {bucket} are no longer valid. Please provide new credentials.

data_description.access_key_id: The new access key ID for your S3 compatible storage.
data_description.secret_access_key: The new secret access key for your S3 compatible storage.
